name: mitra
description: Mitra is a lightweight ActivityPub-powered microblogging platform with simplified posting, federation, and privacy controls. Itâ€™s self-hosted and designed to be easy to deploy while remaining efficient.
features: ActivityPub federation: Connect with Mastodon, Pleroma, and other fediverse platforms to share posts across networks.
Microblogging: Publish short posts with text, images, and links in a Twitter-like interface for quick updates.
Privacy controls: Set post visibility to public, followers-only, or direct messages for granular audience control.
Lightweight design: Run efficiently with minimal resource requirements compared to heavier fediverse platforms.
Follow system: Build a timeline by following users from your instance or across the federated network.
Media attachments: Upload images and files to posts with automatic thumbnail generation and optimization.
Hashtag support: Tag posts for discoverability and browse trending topics across the fediverse.
Simple deployment: Install and configure quickly with straightforward setup process and minimal dependencies.
